solution_line_template: The total height the next three highest can jump is {total_height_three_jumpers} inches because {jump1} + {jump2} + {jump3} = <<{jump1}+{jump2}+{jump3}={total_height_three_jumpers}>>{total_height_three_jumpers}

The average height they can jump is {average_height_three_jumpers} inches because {total_height_three_jumpers} / {num_jumpers} = <<{total_height_three_jumpers}/{num_jumpers}={average_height_three_jumpers}>>{average_height_three_jumpers}
Ravi can jump {ravi_jump_height} inches high because {average_height_three_jumpers} x {ravi_jump_factor} = <<{average_height_three_jumpers}*{ravi_jump_factor}={ravi_jump_height}>>{ravi_jump_height}
